#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define MAX                  100007
#define LL long long 
#define rep(i,a,b)   for(int i=a;i<=b;++i)
LL A[MAX],dp[MAX];
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	LL n,k;
	int t;cin>>t;while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n>>k;
		rep(i,1,n) cin>>A[i];
		memset(dp,0,sizeof dp);
		

        LL max_so_far=0,i;
		for(i=1;i<=k;i++)
		{
			if(A[i]>max_so_far)
				max_so_far=A[i];
			dp[i]=max_so_far;
		}
		while(i<=n){
		    dp[i]=max(dp[i-1],A[i]+dp[i-k-1]);
		    ++i;
		}
		cout<<dp[n]<<endl;
	}
return 0;
}
